data.meta_description: Electronic Arts (EA) | 1,395,032 followers on LinkedIn. Make your daydream your dream job. #OurWorkIsPlay | We exist to inspire the world to play. We put our people first, and we thrive off their diversity in our innovative technology and immersive storytelling. We’re doing the work to give everyone the space to be their full selves while giving back to our community, no matter where you’re working from.
data.text:
🎉 Achievement Unlocked! 🎉 A massive shoutout to our amazing North American interns who are wrapping up their internships with us! 🙌 Last week at our annual Intern Fair, our interns showcased the incredible impact they've made across our portfolio of games and experiences. From uncovering new insights and enhancing processes to bringing fresh experiences to our games, we are inspired by their contributions this year. 🚀 Let’s give a huge round of applause and celebrate the hard work and dedication of our interns! 🎊 👏 Curious about kickstarting your career with us? Discover more about our Early Careers program here 👉 https://lnkd.in/gCeAVujK

⭐ Get Ready for #SIGGRAPH2024 with EA! ⭐ We are proud to be a sponsor of ACM SIGGRAPH and have an exciting lineup taking the stage at this year’s conference! Here’s a sneak peek of what’s in store: 🏈 EA SPORTS™ College Football 25 Dive into the colossal world of game development with our Stadium Toolkit, technical art, and render teams! Ishaan Singh, Jay Goodman, and Richard Burgess-Dawson are presenting this talk in The Sporting Life session. 💥 Advances in Real-Time Rendering in Games Explore groundbreaking rendering techniques with Frostbite engineers Simon Taylor and Diede Apers! Learn about flexible shader authoring with Serac and the stunning GIBS lighting system that’s setting new standards in gaming visuals. 🛠️ Position Based Material Point Method Join Christopher Lewin from SEED as he introduces a game-changing simulation method for integrating new physical materials in your favorite games. Get ready for next-level realism! 🎓 Educator’s Day Session Discover how EA and SEED are partnering with academic institutions across the globe to drive cutting-edge research and build early-career talent through community engagement and exciting research collaborations. Learn more at 👉 https://lnkd.in/eBAJFCCe

Today, we are proud to celebrate the impact EA SPORTS FC FUTURES has had since its launch just over a year ago! ⚽ 💫 FC FUTURES is a values-driven program which represents a commitment from us to grassroots football, driving innovation in products, communities, and strategic partnerships held within the heart of the game. In its first year, FC FUTURES opened access to football to over 170,000 people across six continents, creating new opportunities for countless young enthusiasts to embrace the game. Read more about how FC FUTURES empowers children to reach their full potential on and off the pitch. ➡️ https://lnkd.in/eT6B75ri

Celebrate our #intEArns across EA for #NationalInternDay! 🎉 This summer, our interns gained hands-on experience with our next-level entertainment experiences around the globe while learning from the best in the game. 🎮 Starting with our in-person Intern Early Access events across Vancouver, Redwood City, Orlando, Bucharest, and Guildford, our interns kicked off their experience with workshops, talks with company leaders, and exciting team-building events. Throughout their journeys, they embraced challenges, expanded their skills, connected with our teams, and contributed their ideas - to make play happen. We’re so proud of all they’ve accomplished with us! Ready to level up with Electronic Arts? 🌟 Check out our Early Careers Program here! 👉 https://lnkd.in/gCeAVujK

🎮 Meet Alter, Apex Legends' newest legend! Alter is the first playable Legend of Chinese descent, inspired by lead writer, Jaclyn S.’s experience as a Chinese-Canadian woman. ⚡ We are proud to reflect the stories of our communities worldwide by crafting authentic characters, immersive worlds, and unforgettable experiences. Read more about how we craft authentic characters in our games here 👉 https://lnkd.in/epkF9vNr #ApexLegends #WeAreEA #MakePlayHappen

🎉 We are proud to be named one of the best places to work for disability inclusion!🏆 EA has achieved a top score of 100 on the 2024 Disability Equality Index®, naming us as one of the best places to work for disability inclusion. We are thrilled that this is our first year scoring 100, reaffirming our ongoing commitment and continued progress towards fostering an inclusive culture that reflects the communities we serve.
